rows.label: qst711902_msg0002
rows.name:
It doesn't look like you've performed
the five Blade Combos I asked for
yet, not to my knowledge, anyway.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0003
rows.name:
A basic Blade Combo is any Special
followed by any other one of at least
level 2. That's all there is to it.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0004
rows.name:
You choose the place, time, and
target. My ether powers will
tell me when you've used them.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0101
rows.name:
Excellent work. I can tell
you performed the five Blade
Combos I asked for.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0102
rows.name:
I'll report the good news
to Gororo, my Driver.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0103
rows.name:
I have to hand it to you,
you passed the preliminary
test with flying colors.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0104
rows.name:
...Oh? Didn't I tell you?
This is a two-step process.
The real test starts now!

rows.label: qst711902_msg0105
rows.name:
Considering your skills, I'd
say you're ready to move
straight onto the next step.

rows.label: qst711902_msg0106
rows.name:
I'll be right here, so come
and talk to me whenever you're
ready and we'll continue.
